org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent

Interface ConnectedComponentProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRenderer, AffineInvariantMoments, AxisRenderer, BasicShapeDescriptor, BlobExtractorRenderer, BlobRenderer, BorderRenderer, BoundaryDistanceDescriptor, BoundingBoxRenderer, CentroidRenderer, Close, ColourDescriptor, ConfigurableRendererMono, ConfigurableRendererRGB, Dilate, Erode, HitAndMiss, HuMoments, Open, OrientatedBoundingBoxRenderer, SequentialThin, Skeleton, Thicken, Thin

    public interface ConnectedComponentProcessor
    Interface for objects that can perform processing on a ConnectedComponent.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void process(ConnectedComponent cc)
      Perform an operation on the given ConnectedComponent.

        Perform an operation on the given ConnectedComponent.
        Parameters:
        cc - The ConnectedComponent to process.
